ing: 2 Red Delicious apples, cored and diced
2 Granny Smith apples, cored and diced
n: Waldorf Salad with Walnut Oil Vinaigrette
des: "A wonderful light Waldorf Salad with no mayo. The flavors of the apples, walnuts and raisins are so clean and fresh. It never fails to please."
ins: Toss together the Red Delicious apples, Granny Smith apples, celery, raisins, and walnuts in a large bowl; set aside.  In a small bowl, whisk together the walnut oil, cider vinegar, salt, and pepper.  Toss the apples with the dressing to serve.
